entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Monitor has no owner thread, but million waiters #106508
  • A cryptic TaskCanceledException at System.Net.Http.HttpConnectionPool.SendWithVersionDetectionAndRetryAsync when establising an HTTP2 connection hangs #106507
  • Test failure "RemoteExecutionException : Half-way through waiting for remote process." in System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.IOCompletionPortCountConfigVarTest #106494
  • [9.0] System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.IOCompletionPortCountConfigVarTest #106493
  • Android: Debug Mode & Interpreter Performance #106491
  • Make crypto tests resilient to Azure Linux OpenSSL #106489
  • [wasm][mt] Index was outside the bounds of the array. #106488
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!m_b2->IsLast()' during 'Optimize bools' #106487
    9.0.0
  • Exception at Microsoft.DotNet.RemoteExecutor.RemoteInvokeHandle.Dispose(Boolean disposing) #106486
  • PersistedAssemblyBuilder ILGenerator cannot handle catch block with newly created exception type #106485
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed `gtCostsInitialized` during `Determine first cold block` #106484
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!(checkUnusedValues && def->IsUnusedValue()) && "operands should never be marked as unused values"' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #106480
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'ins != INS_invalid' during 'Generate code' #106478
  • Building System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.csproj (all TFMs) fails locally #106476
  • SYSLIB0057 (X509Certificate2 ctor is obsolete) errors in runtime code base #106472
  • Argument not passed correctly on ARM64 #106471
  • InvalidOperationException when accessing property from dynamically generated class-type in Blazor WASM .NET 8 #106469
  • Debugger shows incorrect local variable values following an exception #106467
  • [ios] `HybridGlobalization`, functions calculating `matchLength` should return PNSE #106465
    10.0.0
  • Setting Thread.Name before Start() not working on macOS #106464
  • WASM: Satellite resources not read as expected in .net9.0 preview7 #106456
  • Ubuntu 24.04 LTS is not supported by the .NET 9 Preview installer. Please use the dotnet-install script - https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/core/tools/dotnet-install-script. #106452
  • Assertion failed `supportedInstructionSet.HasInstructionSet(InstructionSet.X64_AVX512F_VL)` #106450
  • Problem with hitting breakpoints while using Firefox or Firefox Developer Edition in InteractiveWebAssembly render mode, but no issues when using Microsoft Edge or Google Chrome. #106470
  • [help]NET 8 from Xamarin.Mac, there is a problem writing to NAS. #106448
  • [API Proposal]: RateLimiter uses TimeProvider #106447
  • Revert localization back to main after releasing .NET 9 #106433
    10.0.0

Closed

  • Port CodeDom, Net, CompilerServices and Text docs for .NET 9 APIs #105988
    9.0.0
  • `JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/Bytemark/Bytemark` failed with `Assert failure: al->alloc_list_tail() == 0` #105201
    9.0.0
  • [GC] GetLogicalProcessorCacheSizeFromOS should fallback per cache level #83964
    9.0.0
  • [LoggerMessageAttribute] generates CS0757 and CS0102 when combined with XAML and certain NuGet package references. #106459
    Future
  • InvalidCastException from NativeAOT compiler during benchmarkdotnet run #106501
    9.0.0
  • Port System.Buffers docs for .NET 9 APIs #105978
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: Regression in System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.X509ChainTests on 7/24/2024 9:00:29 AM #105819
    9.0.0
  • C# record with expression crashes at runtime under AOT #106468
  • [NativeAOT, win-x86] Bad EH info generated for nested trys #101364
    10.0.0
  • [browser] HybridGlobalization, SoftHypen is not ignored when it should be #95473
    Future
  • Runtime generates asm to explicitly convert from Span to ReadOnlySpan #106458
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 1 Regression in System.Tests.Perf_Int128 #104739
    9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] When attempting to AOT compile a benchmark `System.InvalidCastException: Specified cast is not valid` is thrown #106439
  • [browser][AOT][Test Failure] System.Net.Http.Unit.Tests.HPack.HuffmanDecodingTests.HuffmanDecoding_ValidEncoding_Succeeds #106323
    10.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: Add test coverage for *Faulting* cases to make sure inactive lanes are zeroed out #105580
    9.0.0
  • SslStream.KeyExchangeStrength is zero on non-Windows platforms #66705
    Future
  • Custom Allocator to lower GC frequency and improve cache locality #7175
  • Apps on Tizen cannot work without native images #8009
  • Marshalling source generation code could pass TypePositionInfo and StubCodeContext only to constructors and have parameterless generation methods #89033
    10.0.0
  • In host MSI, repairing TPN file is broken: install txt files in separate components #3724
  • Native DLL load prefers app local over framework irrespective of file version #1459
  • Unload assembly with shared assemblies. #2357
  • Miscellaneous.CopyCtor.ValidateCopyConstructorAndDestructorCalled failing with "Values Differ" #106428
  • Enum.ToObject(Type, object) method overload handles nint and nuint types incorrectly #106098
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Console.Write* convenience overloads for span #103500
    10.0.0
  • Possible tiered compilation issue in preview.7 #106427
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Potential bad codegen with `Avx512BW` intrinsic functions #105969
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Fix Enum field type bug found when underlying type is set from assembly loaded with MLC #106513
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [cdac] Fix getting array function type in RuntimeTypeSystem.IsArrayMethod #106512
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix stack overflow in the logging source gen #106511
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • JIT: update simd base type when combining simd nodes for bitwise ops #106510
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Base64Url fuzzer #106509
    needs-area-label
  • Ensure that integer parsing correctly handles non-zero fractional data #106506
    area-System.Runtime
  • [cdac] Fix getting free object size in GetObjectData #106505
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Update `MethodTable::IsDynamicStatics` and `DacpMethodTableData::bIsDynamic` to return 0/1 instead of flag value #106504
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Make GetPropertyCount public and fix its return value #106503
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix Type System Equivalence Checks #106498
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove `HelperMethodFrame`s from `Object` methods #106497
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix stack overflow handling with SuperPMI #106495
    area-PAL-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Remove implicit fallthrough assert in bool optimizer #106492
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Update packaging.targets #106490
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [cdac] Add helper methods to Target for reading UTF-8/16 strings #106483
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove RefOnly optional msbuild switch #106482
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Clean-up System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.csproj #106477
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Build libs.tests -allconfigurations in CI #106474
    needs-area-label
  • Remove CONTEXT_XSTATE in FaultingExceptionFrame::UpdateRegDisplay #106466
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [feature/9.0-cdac-backports] Data descriptor changes for GetMethodDescName #106463
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [apple-mobile] Disable TLSWitLoadedDlls for Apple mobile due to missing native libs #106461
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios
  • Disallow types with property names conflicting with metadata. #106460
    area-System.Text.Json, 10.0.0
  • Replace TlsStream type by using SslStream directly #106451
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Arm64/Sve Test: test randomized masks for LoadVector APIs (#101475) #106449
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [ObjWriter/Mach-O] Mark non-global symbols as .private_extern to match ELF #106446
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add N_NO_DEAD_STRIP flag to section symbols #106444
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Provide System.Composition package readme #106443
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • Use .alt_entry on Apple platforms in assembly helpers #106442
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix Issue #105820 #106440
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Split dotnet/runtime-only downlevel LibraryImport support into its own source generator #106436
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 10.0.0

Merged

  • Add inter branch merge flow config for 9.0 RC branches #106425
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix Enum field type bug found when underlying type is set from assembly loaded with MLC #106375
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0-rc1] Revert "Use `Unsafe.BitCast` for `Int128` ↔`UInt128` operators" #106431
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, 9.0.0
  • Port of dependency name update: https://github.com/dotnet/performance/pull/4396 #106422
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/9.0-rc1] Change OneLocBuild mirror branch to release/9.0 temporarily #106434
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Change OneLocBuild mirror branch to release/9.0 temporarily #106432
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update packaging.targets #106327
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Bump the release/9.0 branch to RC2 #106429
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to the MacOS arm64 pool for official builds #106416
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add missing compile item in System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Wasm.Tests.csproj #106473
    area-System.Net
  • [NativeAOT] Fix stack trace iteration over exceptions #105877
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [cdac] Fix ThreadStoreData finalizer and GC thread #106435
    area-System.Diagnostics
  • [cdac] Fix lookup map pointers in GetModuleData #106437
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [browser] Fix `HybridGlobalization`, SoftHyphen is not ignored when it should be #105946
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Revert "Use `Unsafe.BitCast` for `Int128` ↔`UInt128` operators" #106430
    area-System.Numerics
  • Expose QUIC TLS details on QuicConnection. #106391
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, 10.0.0
  • Avoid compiler crash when `UsageBasedMetadataGenerationOptions.CompleteTypesOnly` is specified #106445
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Revert "Disable QUIC&HTTP/3 parallelization on tests (#104948)" #106404
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Enhance the bound generator concept to remove duplicate parameters and make it more pervasive throughout the system #105597
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 10.0.0
  • Fix NativeAOT runtime build without FEATURE_EVENT_TRACE #106157
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix Enum.ToObject(Type, object) for nint/nuint #106109
    area-System.Runtime, 10.0.0
  • Add Console.Write{Line} span overloads #105531
    area-System.Console, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Switch 8.0 build images to Azure Linux 3.0 #106170
    area-Infrastructure
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Cast UInt64 to Single directly during const folding #106419
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Instrumentation #100294
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Track generic instantiations in ILLink #106370
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Inject IJW Copy Constructor calls in the JIT instead of in the IL stubs #106424
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Bump versioning to .NET 10 #106421
    area-Infrastructure, 10.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2516600 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #106340
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fallback to treating as object if not collection #106378
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [cdac] Basic ISOSDacInterface::GetMethodDescData #106413
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Make all of the trimmer aware of recursive interfaces #103317
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • ILLink: Rebuild override info after custom step runs #104566
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Add Azure 3.0 helix test #106330
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix EventListenerThreadPool test #105895
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Fixed creating generic type with abstract type when it is has a default constractor constrant #101963
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use ProjectReferences in libs #106329
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Remove fallthrough restrictions in `Compiler::fgOptimizeBranch` #105625
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [Tar] Fill in the file size even if the file is empty. #106409
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [wasm] Allow to build browser in library mode #106388
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Error out when struct size is bigger than int.MaxValue #104393
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [WASI] HTTP client testing #105838
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Clarify XML comments for Utf8Parser.TryParse to reflect case insensitivity #103861
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Revert "[browser] Remove check for user agent when attaching debugger" #106426
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Add GetKeyedService overload with Type #105860
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Obsolete ExchangeAlgorithmType, CipherAlgorithmType and HashAlgorithmType and their usage #105875
    area-System.Net.Security, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Remove managed interfaces impls defined in CoreCLR #105965
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Don't run `fgUpdateFlowGraph` after reordering blocks if using RPO-based layout #105652
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Reapply "Remove zlib from requirements script and instruction files"" #105450
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO.Compression, blocked, 9.0.0
  • Check HFA alignment for valuetype fields #106099
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [TypeName] Nested types should respect MaxNode count #106334
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-15
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] support `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` on WASIp2 #2614
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] add support for building WASI and browser debug & release on Linux #2605
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • Integrate TypeSpec into TypeDecls and ABI parsing. #2650

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implement support for private NuGet feeds in package tab-completion #42776
  • System.IO.SerialPort DataReceived drops bytes, not reliable. For serious RS232 use this library has been unusable. #42774
  • [iOS] Net 9 Preview 7, iOS app in Release will crash when UseInterpreter is set to true #42752
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-rc.1.24413.1] Failed to execute command "dotnet watch run" with error "Hot Reload based watching is only supported in .NET 6.0 or newer apps" #42748

Closed

  • EnableUnsafeBinaryFormatterSerialization should be off by default for all projects for .NET 9+ #42311
    9.0.1xx
  • Dotnet publish container regression in 8.0.400 #42719
  • [8.0.400] MSBuild Crash when publishing containers #42731
  • after updating to sdk 9.0.100-preview.7.24407.12 build fails with "MSB3030: Could not copy the file...apphost.exe" #42722

PullRequests

Created

  • Clean up some code #42775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enabled codeflow through 9.0.1xx #42766
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Enable tab-completion for nuget package versions #42349
    Area-NuGet, Area-CLI, cli-ux
  • Enable CI builds for the public RC2 branch #42747
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • RC2 Branding #42744
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove internet sources from auditSources section #42740
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #42735
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #42737
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #42738
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Send "workload set not installed" messages #42683
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Maybe permit users to find latest set versions #42652
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Find all workloads! Even if they're in another feature band Fixes #42502 #42513
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Extend `dotnet run` to invoke a run-command-producing Target #42240
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.4xx #42701
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42736
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42739
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #41936
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Partner request

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: Expression blocks #3086
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Move the old DU proposal to rejected #8365
  • Update field keyword proposal for LDM 2024-08-14 #8361

Updated

  • Describe span ambiguities due to type inference #8358

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reenable BC30645ERR_InvalidOptionalParameterUsage1b #74779
    17.12
  • Refactoring suggestion -> Move to new file needs a confirmation dialog #74778
  • Allow the Visual Studio "Sync Namespaces" tool to work at the folder level, not just Project and Solution. #74777
  • Automatic exception xml tag when using static class such as ArgumentNullException #74776
  • Usage of Activator.CreateInstance won't show in references on the constructor, so there is misleading info! #74774
  • `CSharpMergeConsecutiveIfStatementsCodeRefactoringProvider` encountered an error and has been disabled #74773
  • `CSharpMergeNestedIfStatementsCodeRefactoringProvider` encountered an error and has been disabled #74772
  • `CSharpWrappingCodeRefactoringProvider` encountered an error and has been disabled #74771
  • Using SuppressMessage on a const declaration causes Diagnostic analyzer runner interal error #74770

Closed

  • Bitwise operators crash intellisense documentation #74782
  • Partial properties on struct warn about field ordering #74679
    17.12
  • Bad performance in CSharpRemoveUnnecessaryImportsDiagnosticAnalyzer with System.Text.Json source generator #74761
  • Use interpolated string handler for string concat #74768
  • IDE0300 fix-all skips first diagnostic in a cascading ternary #71522
    17.12
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35214.134 #74764

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Copilot option bug #74781
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Load analyzers and generators in isolated ALCs in our OOP process #74780
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Redirect SDK analyzers to VS #74775
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Optimize single spread collection expression for `List<T>` #74769
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Move net451 test assets to net461 #74766
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Allow user to control if they want generated-doc results to appear in navigate to. #74765
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Snippet refactoring 2 #74767
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Handle partial properties in struct field ordering warning #74706
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove net35 reference assemblies #74763
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Expose document symbols to Razor cohosting #74730
    VSCode, Next
  • Fix nested nullability of collection expressions #74490
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Update LSP Protocol Types #73911
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce allocations from newline information allocated by ChangedText.GetLinesCore #74728
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not run 'remove unnecessary imports' on generated code #74762
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add file watchers for analyzer references #74745
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Report field diagnostic as warning, only report when ambiguous, and only with preview language version #74729
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make host outputs public #74750
    Area-Compilers, Needs API Review
  • Use single argument overload for `[start..]` of `string` or `(ReadOnly)Span` #74643
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix `NETCOREAPP3_0_OR_GREATER` in `SegmentedArrayHelper` #74687
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix allow ref like types for synthesized TypeParameterSymbols in Ad-Hoc Delegates #74714
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #57352
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #57351
  • InputSelect Component has potentially a bug. On Form submit, it causes another field not to databind in the model. #57350
  • AuthorizationHandler called twice when using a global filter #57348
  • `__RequestVerificationToken` Placement Issue with Multiple Handlers in Razor Pages #57345
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-rc.1.24409.1] No "400 - bad" ErrorResponse shows in CleanArchitecture app #57343
  • Perf regression: mvc #57342
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `aspnetcore/release/9.0-rc1` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #57341

Closed

  • [Blazor] Investigate why E2E tests aren't catching trimming issues #56344
    9.0-rc2
  • [Blazor] rendermode="InteractiveAuto" cleared injection of AuthenticationStateProvider #57274
  • builder.Services.AddDataProtection().PersistKeysToFileSystem() how to ensure 100% availability when a web farm of servers are using a single file share to decrypt and validate an AntiForgeryToken #54561
  • Published size improvement: todosapivanilla #57353
  • Published size improvement: todosapivanilla #57292
  • Authroization policy evaluation should not implictly require authentication scheme. #57322
  • Unexpected Syntax Error in blazor.web.js on iOS Versions Below 17 in .NET 9 Preview 7 #57326
  • Use case support for Blazor Web App in Interactive Auto mode #57327
  • GroupName is applied to all endpoints when it shouldn't be. #57241
  • OIDC front channel remote sign-out "iss" claim check bypassed by default #57254
  • ASP.NET Core Identity is logging users out after an hour or so #57177
  • F# discriminated union custom converter isn't used. #51481
  • Add a Description property to the ProducesResponseTypeAttribute<T> #57272
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #57300

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix CanBindToFormWithFiles #57355
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] Use 7.* IdentityModel package in val pipeline #57349
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Update branding to 10.0 #57340
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Upgrade xunit version to 2.9.0 #57303
    area-infrastructure
  • Use System.Threading.Lock in Kestrel #57236
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Propagate PropertyInfo for AsParameters parameters #57264
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #57339
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Docs/test updates/migration guidance for new runtime metrics in dotnet-counters #4806
    9.0.0
  • [Test] Microsoft.Diagnostics.Monitoring.EventPipe.UnitTests.EventCounterTriggerWithEventPipePipelineTest fails intermittently #4782
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for MSFZ/PDZ files #4868
  • [Tests] Reenable EventLogspipelineUnitTests #4867
  • WIP [Test] Reenable EventPipeSessionTests #4866

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [net9.0] Shift platforms specific code from HybridWebView to the handler using Command Mappers #24269
    9.0-rc1
  • Rewrite `RadioButtonGroup` to solve memory issues #24264
  • Add Tag property to Element #24262
    Backlog
  • Targeting Android SDK 33 but seen error related to targetSDK=35 (Android.App.MissingForegroundServiceTypeException) at runtime. #24260
  • Make the MergedStyle and its property Style (that is of type IStyle) public #24257
    9.0-rc1
